flawed_nl_solution:
He runs at 0.1 miles per minute because 6 / 60 = <<6/60=0.1>>0.1
While the album is playing he can run 4 miles because 40 x 0.1 = <<40*0.1=4>>4
He has to run 5 miles without the album because 6 - 4 = <<6-4=5>>5
Without music he runs 1/15 miles per minute because 4 / 60 = 1/15
He will run the remaining 5 miles in 75 minutes because 5 / (1/15) = <<5/(1/15)=75>>75
It will take him 115 minutes in total because 40 + 75 =<<40+75=115>>115

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 2.0, not 5.0. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
